mapper.insert: insert into tb_app_visitqiye ( pkid, visitdate, username, qiyename, address, mainbusiness, income, netprofit, staffsize, findemand, servedemand, linkman, linktel, pictures, remark, lurushijian, inputuser, lastchgtime ) values ( #{pkid}, #{visitdate}, #{username}, #{qiyename}, #{address}, #{mainbusiness}, #{income}, #{netprofit}, #{staffsize}, #{findemand}, #{servedemand}, #{linkman}, #{linktel}, #{pictures}, #{remark}, getdate(), #{inputuser}, getdate() )
mapper.update:
update tb_app_visitqiye set
visitdate=#{visitdate},
username=#{username},
qiyename=#{qiyename},
address=#{address},
mainbusiness=#{mainbusiness},
income=#{income},
netprofit=#{netprofit},
staffsize=#{staffsize},
findemand=#{findemand},
servedemand=#{servedemand},
linkman=#{linkman},
linktel=#{linktel},
pictures=#{pictures},
remark=#{remark},
lastchgtime=getdate() where pkid=#{pkid}
